After tonight’s midnight #SanFrancisco fireworks show, the last #Caltrain will pull out of the City at 2am, making all local stops to San Jose. To see how late revelers can party in San Jose & still catch a VTA train or bus home (or to BART), go to VTA’s Service Alerts webpage.
